      Team(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String initials, java.awt.Color primaryColor, java.awt.Color secondaryColor, double eloRating)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDraw(double elo)
      Adds a draw and 1 point to team's statistics, and alters Elo rating accordingly
      void addLoss(double elo)
      Adds a loss to team's statistics and alters Elo rating accordingly
      void addWin(double elo)
      Adds a win and 3 points to team's statistics, and alters Elo rating accordingly
      int getDraws()
      Gets the amount of games the team has drawn
      double getEloRating()
      Gets team's Elo rating

      Gets the amount of games the team has lost

      Gets the team's name
      int getPoints()
      Gets the amount of points the team has accumulated

      Gets the team's TeamLabel
      int getWins()
      Gets the amount of games the team has won

        public Team(java.lang.String name,
    java.lang.String initials,
    java.awt.Color primaryColor,
    java.awt.Color secondaryColor,
    double eloRating)
        Creates a new team in the simulation
        Parameters:
        name - Team name
        initials - Team initials
        primaryColor - Team's primary color
        secondaryColor - Team's secondary color
        eloRating - Team's Elo rating (based on performance, used to find out a winner in each game)
